What I Do

Modern Tech

My Front-End stack includes CSS3, HTML5, Sass, Angular.js, and Node.js.

Web Development

Traditional interactive website design with a modern twist. I bring the latest software development techniques to companies in Austin, Texas.

UX Analysis

Paper prototypes, mockups and surveys to managing designers working on high-fidelity interactive prototyping tools.

About

A brief synopsis of my experiences in the tech industry.

  • 2014-2015

    My Humble Beginnings

    I was the Project Manager and Principal Consultant for BlackLite Labs, a boutique web/mobile development shop in Dallas, Texas. There I transitioned from the business side of tech to UX analysis and quickly discovered my true passion for programming.

  • January-March 2015

    A Junior Developer was Born

    I attended The IronYard's Intesive Front-End Engineering program in Austin, Texas. I wrote production ready code in HTML5, CSS3, Angular.js, and Node.js.

  • April - Today 2015

    Transition to Junior Developer

    Currently seeking a tall, good looking company to work with full time or on a contract basis.
    I'm a team player, eager to learn and ready to push code on Day 1.

  • Future

    Senior Full Stack Developer

    I am constantly studying in my free time while collaborating on projects with local startups in Austin and Dallas. I attend meetups focused on Open Source technology to reach my goal of becoming a full-stack javascript developer utilizing the MEAN stack. The world is my oyster!

  • Be Part
    Of My
    Story!

The Team

UX Analysis, Front End Development

Alex Hidalgo

Front-End Engineer

Alex currently lives in Austin, Texas and is great at guitar, biking the Green Belt, and elephant polo. Alex is not so great at sailing, karaoke, and wakesurfing..but wants to improve!
